entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
